response.overview: Teckademics, the import tuning company that brought you Mischief, the #1 selling street racing title, goes inside the fast-growing world of street trucks. With chapters on dragging, off-road, mud driving, extreme truck launching, trophy trucks, monster trucks, bling-bling show stoppers rollin' on dubs, stupid stunts, crazy audio systems, hopping, bagged and dragged body dropped machines, hot truck chicks, the people behind the mayhem, racing, truck shows, and the 2002 SEMA show, all set to a fast-paced soundtrack from Lobster Records
response.title: Mischief: Mayhem 1 - Street Trucks
